thread.title: Santa Fe’s Hampton runs to trophy finish
thread.title_full: Santa Fe’s Hampton runs to trophy finish

title: Santa Fe’s Hampton runs to trophy finish
text:
Santa Fe’s Hampton runs to trophy finish Santa Fe’s Hampton runs to trophy finish 
Santa Fe High School's Kameron Hampton (above) placed 13th among 272 runners in the Silver Division of the Mid State Cross Country Championships Saturday at Sharp Springs in Smyrna with a time of 17:39. (Courtesy photo)
